text: [[col:green]]Burghal:[[/col]] When all governors are loyal, benefit from improved allegiance and reduced levy upkeep.
[[col:red]]Harvest Season:[[/col]] Peasant units do not replenish during the Harvest or Winter.
[[col:green]]Witan:[[/col]] Powerful decrees with high political costs
[[col:green]]Fyrd:[[/col]] Fyrd units have no recruitment cost during the Spring and Summer
[[col:green]]Military Drills:[[/col]] Unit's gain experience when in the Fortify stance
[[col:green]]Hunter Society:[[/col]] %+n% bonus income from hunting buildings
[[col:green]]Holy Isle of Lindisfarne:[[/col]] %+n% Population Growth for Clergy
[[col:green]]Hoards:[[/col]] Stockpile and distribute wealth to purchase fealty and preserve the kingdom.
